data.title: All Train Routes & Train Timetables
data.meta_description: Looking for train timetables and routes from FlixTrain? Here you can find all the information you need, from departure times to route maps. Plan your trip now!
data.text:
Stops: Berlin - Halle (Saale) - Erfurt - Gotha - Eisenach - Bad Hersfeld - Fulda - Frankfurt - Darmstadt - Bensheim - Mannheim - Heidelberg - Wiesloch-Walldorf - Stuttgart - Karlsruhe - Baden-Baden - Offenburg - Freiburg - Müllheim (Baden) - Basel/Weil am Rhein

Stops via partners: Leipzig, Leipzig/Halle Airport LEJ, Zwickau, Crimmitschau and Altenburg via Halle (Saale); Gera, Jena and Weimar via Erfurt; Wiesbaden and Mainz via Darmstadt; and Esslingen, Plochingen, Nürtingen, Metzingen, Reutlingen and Tübingen via Stuttgart.

The new timetable is valid from August 9th to December 14th, 2024 (see button below).

Please note: the timetable includes all journeys until the end of the year. To see all timetables, please scroll down in the document.

Stops: Berlin - Stendal - Wolfsburg - Hanover - Göttingen - Kassel - Frankfurt - Mainz

The new timetable is valid from March 21st to December 14th, 2024 (see button below).

Please note: the timetable includes all journeys until the end of the year. To see all timetables, please scroll down in the document.

Stops: Cologne - Düsseldorf - Duisburg - Mülheim (Ruhr) - Essen - Bochum - Dortmund - Recklinghausen - Gelsenkirchen - Münster - Osnabrück - Bremen - Hamburg

Stops via partners: Aachen, Stolberg (Rhineland), Eschweiler and Düren via Cologne; Mönchengladbach, Wuppertal and Neuss via Düsseldorf; Viersen and Krefeld via Duisburg; Mülheim (Ruhr) via Essen, Dortmund, Lünen, Werne an der Lippe and Hamm via Münster; Wilhelmshaven, Oldenburg, Cloppenburg, Quakenbrück and Bramsche via Osnabrück; Bremerhaven and Osterholz-Scharmbeck via Bremen; and Lübeck and Bad Oldesloe via Hamburg.

The new timetable is valid from December 10th, 2023 to December 14th, 2024 (see button below).

Please note: the timetable includes all journeys until the end of the year. To see all timetables, please scroll down in the document.

Stops: Aachen - Cologne - Neuss - Düsseldorf - Duisburg - Essen - Bochum - Dortmund - Hamm - Gütersloh - Bielefeld - Herford - Hanover - Stendal - Berlin - Elsterwerda - Dresden

Stops via partners: Aachen, Stolberg, Eschweiler and Düren via Cologne;Mönchengladbach and Neuss via Düsseldorf; Viersen and Krefeld via Essen; Wuppertal, Hagen and Witten via Dortmund; Münster via Hamm; Braunschweig, Peine and Lehrte via Hanover; and Magdeburg via Stendal.

The new timetable is valid from December 10th, 2023 to December 14th, 2024 (see button below).

Please note: the timetable includes all journeys until the end of the year. To see all timetables, please scroll down in the document.

Stops: Hamburg - Berlin - Leipzig

Stops via partners: Halle (Saale), Zwickau, Crimmitschau and Altenburg via Leipzig; and Lübeck and Bad Oldesloe via Hamburg;

The new timetable is valid from December 10th, 2023 to December 14th, 2024 (see button below).

Please note: the timetable includes all journeys until the end of the year. To see all timetables, please scroll down in the document.
